name: nodejs-music
description:
Simple music bot, made using only npm modules as a challenge to try not use lavalink. ## Installation Download files and fill `.env` file with credentials. To run type `node index.js` ## Contributing Pull requests are welcome. For major changes, please open an issue first to discuss what you would like to change. ## Links [My Discord Server](https://discord.gg/vSEC4zz)
[Authors' Website](https://mic0.me) ## License ODbL-1.0
author: mic0
